text: The Estádio da Luz is a football stadium in Lisbon, Portugal. Since the Year 2024, it has a seating capacity of 66,597. This makes it the biggest stadium in the country. The stadium opened on 25 October 2003. It is the home stadium of S.L. Benfica of the Primeira Liga and the Portugal national team. The stadium's official name is Estádio do Sport Lisboa e Benfica. It hosted the UEFA Euro 2004 Final and also held the 2014 UEFA Champions League Final between Real Madrid and Atlético Madrid. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Football in Portugal Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Lisbon Category:2003 establishments in Europe
title: Estádio da Luz
